doc:
This script will generate a problem instance, which is compatible with the following problem representations:
- OrderedHeterogeneousSkillTimeConstraintProblem

The generation will result in the following constant attributes of the instance
- No cooperation: There will be no cooperative nodes present in the dataset
- No heterogeneity: All the nodes will require the same skill; all the vehicles will offer the same skill
- No precedence: No nodes will have a precedence relationship between them. All tasks are indepedendent.
- Random node distribution: Node locations will be completely
- 2D Coordinates: Everything will be on the same z coordinate

The following instance attributes can be set for the generation process:
- Depot Coordinates
- Vehicle speed
- Range for the generation of random task coordinates
- Range for the generation of task durations
- The amount of nodes to be generated
- The amount of vehicles available
(- Location to save data)
